page.title: 19CUSTOMS
page.content:
At the Church when there is a wedding taking place, children from around the village come to sing in the choir.The children outside bring bits of string and tie the gates up. At the end of the wedding the choir get fifty pence each.Then the Bride and Groom come out to have their photographs taken.
When the Bride and Groom go down the path they find that the gates have been tied up by the children. The Best Man comes and he throws some coins out as a ransom.
While the Bride and Groom are having their photographs taken, it gives the children in the choir a chance to get to where all the other children are and to pick up the pennies. While this is happening the Bride and Groom get out.
